articles.title: Realme X3 Series Teased to Sport Snapdragon 855+ SoC, Spotted on Geekbench Ahead of Launch - Gadgets 360
articles.description: Reame India chief Madhav Sheth has tweeted that the Realme X3 SuperZoom and Realme X3 are both powered by the Snapdragon 855+ processor. The Realme X3 has also been spotted on Geekbench revealing key specification details of the phone.
